Title: Flame Surge
Feature: Deals fire damage to a target within range.

Title: Inferno
Feature: Unleashes a wave of fire that damages all enemies in its path.

Title: Fireball
Feature: Launches a small fireball that explodes on impact, dealing fire damage.

Title: Firestorm
Feature: Unleashes a storm of fireballs that hit all enemies in the area.

Title: Ember Spark
Feature: Deals a small amount of fire damage over time to enemies.
